1.Pros: Very flexible as crew, can work with school schedules
1.Cons: Some times can be very unorganized when corporate puts out new items. Everyone seems to scramble.

2.Pros: young workforce and genetic environment a lot of challenging but rewarding projects
2.Cons: the pay is not that great even for a recent grad

3.Pros: consistentcy, works with schedule and alot of college students as co-workers

4.Pros: - Clean Workplace- Fair Hours- Decent Coworkers

5.Cons: The managers and store generally doesn't care. LACK OF COMMUNICATION.

7.Summary: "Good for some quick change, not much more."
7.Pros: Flexible hours. My particular branch had nice management, and I made a few friends there.
7.Cons: Stressful, low-paying job. Not rewarding and pretty much a dead end.

8.Pros: There were some pros to this job, my fun co-workers and i loved interacting with customers. If you take this job seriously, it can be fulfilling.
8.Cons: Management didn't really seem to care. Also, getting any kind of significant raise to reward good, consistent work was pretty much non existent.
